payload.name: game-theory
payload.title: Game theory: assume strategic or misaligned sub-agents
payload.formal: model agents as utility maximizers; equilibria can be bad if incentives mis-specified.
payload.apm2_mapping: treat internal agents as potentially adversarial (this is in the threat model). Therefore: (a) verify claims mechanically (92), (b) bound authority (38), (c) use audits and witnesses, (d) don’t reward narrative.
